extendedInfo.description: * Runno is a game played by your smartphone in real life. Outdoor activities, for example running or walking are logged by phone's location sensors. The user can circle an area by going around it and claim that as hers or his (for example around a landmark, or anywhere in one's neighborhood). At the same time, each calorie burnt will earn user 7 points or Runno's own currency Wallutas. * Users can attack other users' areas and invade part of these areas. In these cases, battles will start. A battle will be decided by sending soldiers to the battle area. The user with more soldiers after the battle time ended (7 days) will retain the battle area as hers/his. Users can have as many areas as they like, and collection of these areas is their Kingdom. Based on the total sum of the areas, each user receives a badge. * Runno is both an individual game and a game you can play with your friends. One claims an area, say a couple of blocks in hers/his neighborhood, town or city. Her/his friends can also go out and claim some areas as well. It might happen that soon enough others will want part of his turfs. Then they choose to battle the user or leave those parts. One can also buy an area from other people, in runno.me Market. * The results of the game and logs of the activities can be viewed at www.runno.me Note: The website might not work properly on IE8, IE7 or IE6. We are working on it, but works as it should on Safari, Firefox, Chrome, Opera and RockMelt browsers.Be advised that this app uses GPS in background mode during activities and Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.***********You can also visit Runno's facebook page: www.facebook.com/runno.meand follow us on twitter: @runnome************

reviews.title: Nexus
reviews.comment: Now it opens on the nexus but I can\'t register. Says enter valid email and won\'t take my Facebook. Guys beta test before live launch. Fb login still doesn\'t work
reviews.author: Jayson Paglow

reviews.title: App (sorta) runs...
reviews.comment: ORIGINAL: Puts two (apparently identical) Runno icons in apps.  Using either of them results in a crash notice with the option to \'Force Close\' or \'Report\'.  I submitted a report.  As an aside, the app description still refers to the iPhone: \"Outdoor activities, for example running or walking are logged by iPhone\'s location sensors.\"  EDIT: Decided to try a re-install - this time rebooting my phone afterward. After reboot, I found two Runno icons again, but now one of them (the first one) successfully starts the app while the second results in a crash as originally reported. At least it starts now.  EDIT2: App ran, registration worked fine, changed settings to MPH and miles, recorded short walk.  Reported results in MPH and miles; but saved walk in history using KPH and kilometers.  Also, it showed that I walked 2.04 miles at 1259 MPH in a bit over 7 minutes.  I assure you with my physique, that is not possible. Upgraded to 2-stars since the app runs (after install, reboot, and using first icon to start the app.  The rest is up for grabs...)
reviews.author: Kyle Dixon
